channel.title: Animations on Ben Clingenpeel
channel.description: Recent content in Animations on Ben Clingenpeel

item.title: The first fundamental theorem of calculus
item.description: This is a video I made using the manim python library based on a proof of the first fundamental theorem of calculus I found lying around in my notes from my first calculus class.

item.title: James Garfield's proof of the Pythagorean Theorem
item.description: This was the first video I made with the manim python library.
